root.name: Where's Waldo?: The Fantastic Journey
root.description: Quests Waldo: In Waldo's quests, you first need to find Waldo, The Wizard and Wenda. Then, a series of items and characters, followed by a scroll. Wenda: In Wenda's quests, you get a series of oddly taken photos, and you need to find the context on the map. Woof: In Woof's quests, 2 pictures that is almost alike, is shown. It is then up to the player to find 7 differences. Odlaw: In Odlaw's quests, you first need to find Odlaw. Then find the swamp-creatures, comprised of snakes, birds, reptiles and monkeys.

similar_games.game: Interpol: The Trail of Dr. Chaos
